sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './styles.css' import '../App.css' import logo from '../images/MB_Logo_alt.svg' function Bookings() { const today = new Date().getTime(); const [appointments, setAppointments] = useState([]) var options = { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }; useEffect(() => { fetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_APIURL}/api/bookings`, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ token: localStorage.getItem('token') }) }) .then(data => data.json()) .then(data => setAppointments(data)) }, []) return (

Your Appointments

{appointments.filter(a => a.date >= today) ? appointments/*.filter(a => a.date.getTime >= today)*/.map((appointment, i) => (

{appointment.service}

{new Date(appointment.date).toLocaleDateString('en-GB', options)}

Name:

{appointment.userName}

Phone:

{appointment.userPhone}

Address:

{appointment.userAddress}

{appointment.userNotes ? <>

Notes:

{appointment.userNotes}

: <> }
Re-order

) ) :

You have no upcoming appointments.

}

Past Appointments

{appointments.filter(a => a.date.getTime <= today) ? appointments.filter(a => a.date.getTime <= today).map((appointment, i) => (

{appointment.service}

{new Date(appointment.date).toLocaleDateString('en-GB', options)}

Name:

{appointment.userName}

Phone:

{appointment.userPhone}

Address:

{appointment.userAddress}

{appointment.userNotes ? <>

Notes:

{appointment.userNotes}

: <> }
Re-order

) ) :

You have no past appointments.

}
) } export default Bookings
